raw_text: REV. SISTER MARY PERPETUAL SUCCOUR ZOYZA expired. Her mortal remains laid to rest at St. Agnes’ Convent,​ Bolawalana,​ Negombo till 3.30 p.m. on Sunday 15th October and thereafter will be taken to Good Shepherd Convent,​ Nayakakanda. The Eucharistic Celebration on Monday 16th at 3.00 p.m. followed by burial.066472

MEURLING – ANTHONY RONALD – Gone to Rest with Jesus. Beloved son of late Banjamin & Mabel,​ loving husband of Nimmie (nee Gunasekara),​ beloved father of Meliza & Julian,​ father-in-law of Roshan Nishantha,​ treasured papa of Ranen,​ Aaron & Riley,​ loving brother of (late) Bertha,​ Clarence,​ Kingsley,​ Victor,​ Bonita (late),​ Doreen,​ Errol,​ Jennifer,​ Hyacinth,​ Christobel & Wendy. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s. Viewing from 15th October at 10.00 a.m. Cortege leaves the Restpect Home on 16th at 4.00 p.m. for burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella (R.C. Section).066475

SONDAPPERUMAARACHCHI – DON MERRIL (S.A.D.A. Merril) of Averiwatta,​ Wattala (Retired,​ Colombo Commercial Co. Teas Ltd.). Loving son of late S.A.A.D.S. Francis and late Mary Engratia,​ loving brother of late Edmond Joseph,​ Adeline Mary,​ Julius Nazarene,​ Mable Maria Regina,​ Theodore Cyprian and Andrew Peter,​ passed away. Funeral service was held on Sunday 15 October at St. Anne’s Church,​ Wattala and interment was at the Public Cemetery,​ Wattala – Roman Catholic Section. 192/​4,​ 2nd Lane,​ Passion Gardens,​ Pattiywatta Road,​ Kothalawala,​ Kaduwela 10640.066453
